nucmercoords_to_bed module¶

Creates a bedfile with non-redundant aligned regions of a query from MUMmer output

param coords_file

Tabulated file generated from a delta file (nucmer output) by show-coords.

type coords_file

str

param min_length

minimum length of the aligned region for it to be included

type min_length

int

param min_identify

minimum percent identity of the aligned region for it to be included.

type min_identify

float

param out_dir

name of the output folder. Bedfiles created will be saved here as <coords_file>.bed and <coords_file>.nr.bed

type out_dir

str

Notes: Tested with bedtools v2.27.1 and MUMmer 3.23

nucmercoords_to_bed.coords_to_bed(coords_file, min_identity, min_length, out_dir, logfile=None)¶

Creates a bedfile with non-redundant aligned regions of a query from MUMmer output

Parameters

  • coords_file (str) – tabulated file generated from a delta file (nucmer output) by show-coords.

  • min_length (int) – minimum length of the aligned region for it to be included

  • min_identify (float) – minimum percent identity of the aligned region for it to be included.

  • out_dir (str) – name of the output folder. Bedfiles created will be saved here as <coords_file>.bed and <coords_file>.nr.bed

Returns: the name of the bedfile (str)

nucmercoords_to_bed.init_args()¶
